chunk:
Love Byrd Green Smoothie Serum

Brand: Love Byrd

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Avocado oil, broccoli seed oil, lime essential oil.

Directions: Apply two to three drops of treatment on cleansed skin. Gently pat cheeks, forehead, and chin to evenly distribute the application before gently massaging it into the skin.

Ingredient concerns
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
